title: Bluey: How a Welshman brings the kids cartoon to life
content: This video can not be playedOwain Emanuel has been working on the Australian children's cartoon series, Bluey, since 2016.Originally from Bridgend, he is now a professional designer in Melbourne.The show, which follows the adventures of Bluey the blue heeler puppy, has become a sensation across the world - including in Britain since it first appeared on our screens two years ago.But how does Owain help bring the characters to life?
